text: Pas, sajton muciʙi laƣƶis [va sarpecii] on du sud. Sipas Alloh taolo onhoro az on ci dar on ʙudand [ʙihist] ʙerun kard va [ʙa on du va sajton] guftem: "Hamagi [ʙa zamin] furud oed, dar hole ki dusmani jakdigar xohed ʙud va ʙarojaton dar zamin to muddati muajjan qarorgoh va vasilai ʙahraʙardori vucud xohad dost
